filename.title: Filename
filename.description: Name of the file with extension

checksum.title: Checksum
checksum.description: SHA256 hash of the file's content

File.title: File
File.description: Represents a file stored on the server side i.e. a unique reference to a file in the cloud.

runner_url.title: Runner Url
runner_url.description: Link to the solver's job (parent collection)

submitted_at.title: Submitted At
submitted_at.description: Last modification timestamp of the solver job

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: Timestamp that indicate the moment the solver starts execution or None if the event did not occur

stopped_at.title: Stopped At
stopped_at.description: Timestamp at which the solver finished or killed execution or None if the event did not occur

released.title: Released
released.description: Maps every route's path tag with a released version

OnePage_SolverPort_.title: OnePage[SolverPort]
OnePage_SolverPort_.description:
A single page is used to envelope a small sequence that does not require
pagination

If total >  MAXIMUM_NUMBER_OF_ITEMS_PER_PAGE, we should consider extending this
entrypoint to proper pagination

gravatar_id.title: Gravatar Id
gravatar_id.description: md5 hash value of email to retrieve an avatar image from https://www.gravatar.com

RunningState.title: RunningState
RunningState.description:
State of execution of a project's computational workflow

SEE StateType for task state

version.title: Version
version.description: semantic version number of the node

Solver.title: Solver
Solver.description: A released solver with a specific version

content_schema.title: Content Schema
content_schema.description: jsonschema for the port's value. SEE https://json-schema.org
